com.onwbp.base.text
Class NomenclatureItemValue

java.lang.Object
  com.onwbp.base.text.NomenclatureItem
      com.onwbp.base.text.NomenclatureItemValue
public class NomenclatureItemValue
extends NomenclatureItem

A NomenclatureItemValue is a label value in a containing Nomenclature. The value should correspond to the associated type.

The code that implements the layout must decide how to display an instance of this class.

See Also:
Nomenclature
